ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that identify patients who currently smoke tobacco products (e.g. tobacco user, smoker).),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Assessment, Performed for "Tobacco Use Status" as an attribute of result. The intent of this data element is to identify patients who currently smoke tobacco products.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with SNOMED CT codes identifying current smokers of tobacco (e.g. tobacco user, smoker) without indicating the specific type of tobacco product used (e.g. cigarette smoker, cigar, pipe).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to former tobacco users, never users of tobacco, or users of non-tobacco products (e.g. e-cigarettes). Exclude concepts indicating the specific type of tobacco product used (e.g. cigarette user, pipe, cigar).)
